message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $100, but I'd love to get it for a bit cheaper.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $105. How about we meet at $98? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $102.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $95? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can agree on this price.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $99.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $99 and my previous offer of $95. How about we meet at $97? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can agree on this price.
